snippet: ELLIS--Richard A.,Ph.D. On August 14, 2016, friends and students are invited to celebrate the life of Brown University biology Professor Richard A. Ellis, Ph.D. Cape Cinema, Rte. 6a, Dennis, MA, at 11am. www.profellis.com. 1/3...
